amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to fund the Tooling and Machining Association in Rochester, New York.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds from being used for the Tooling and Machining Association in Rochester, New York.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A028) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A028) Failed by voice vote.
